lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They said that in the absence of other factors, participants awaited the outcome of the informal talks of Group of Five finance ministers and central bankers in Washington today, and Group of Seven monetary talks tomorrow.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Expectations were rising of a further half-point cut in the Japanese discount rate and Japan's ruling Liberal Democratic Party today announced an outline agreement on economic reflation which includes a 5,000 billion yen additional budget for 1987, the dealers said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Group of Five and Canada agreed in Paris on February 22 to call a halt to the dollar's sharp decline, and several participant central banks have since intervened to keep currencies within narrow ranges against each other.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They said that in the absence of other factors, participants awaited the outcome of the informal talks of Group of Five finance ministers and central bankers in Washington today, and Group of Seven monetary talks tomorrow.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Expectations were rising of a further half-point cut in the Japanese discount rate and Japan's ruling Liberal Democratic Party today announced an outline agreement on economic reflation which includes a 5,000 billion yen additional budget for 1987, the dealers said.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The Group of Five and Canada agreed in Paris on February 22 to call a halt to the dollar's sharp decline, and several participant central banks have since intervened to keep currencies within narrow ranges against each other.
